TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
The 2th Great Forum Crash happen and you not the 3000th post of this thread anymore.

I wish I could meet jebediah.

Granted. NOW PREPARE URANUS TO DIE A FIERY ROCKETY ROCKETY GIGGITY GIGGITY GRAVITY GRAVITY DEATH!

I wish for yes.
Granted, you get a resounding "yes" to your question about whether or not your life will be... confiscated.

43

I wish for a space program dedicated to corgis.

44. But seriously, it was just a youtube link, is it really that hard to corrupt a wish when you use one? Anyway...

I wish for some MAGIK. (snort snort)

Granted, this magic makes you suicide.

I wish i didn't make that double post.

Granted. You made a triple post.

I wish my computer was faster.

Granted but the screen is just a big blur because its going too fast.

I wish I had a pie right now.

Granted, but its a 2 week old unrefrigerated one.

I wish that Jupiter was green.

Granted. It is now earth-sized Jool.

I wish for time paradox.

Granted. Universe disappeared.

I wish i could fly to Mars

Granted, but you are now allergic to the color red, so when you get there you quickly (and maybe even a little comically) puff up and explode from the overwhelming redness of the martian dust.

I wish that you could brute force your way to FTL speeds.

Granted, but the Brute force tears your ship apart.

I wish that my ship had more Delta-V

Granted, but this is achieved by ejecting the crew capsule from the ship, decreasing it's mass.

I wish for a steampunk computer.

Granted, but this is achieved by ejecting the crew capsule from the ship, decreasing it's mass.

I wish for a steampunk computer.

Granted. The steampunkiness (that's not even a word) is too overwhelming and your computer explodes.

I wish for sandwich.

Granted, but it contains arsenic and you die from the poison.

I wish I was the richest person in the world.
Granted, but the way you do this is by money being created on the spot, ruining the economy for everyone including you.

Not Granted, because there's no wish!

I wish i had a copy of Kerpal Spooce Prokram

granted, you get a game called Serbal Kace Gropram.

I wish to dominate the world

Granted, but the world in this instance is defined by globe with the words: WOÃÂ¯LD crudely drawn on it.

Granted, but now they can read only upside down text.

I wish I had my own working Apollo spacecraft.

Granted, but theres no fuel.

I wish I had the gun from Portal.

Granted, but the first thing you do is open a portal to the Moon, which promptly sucks you in, asphyxiates you, and closes the portal.

I wish the SLS was launching !

Granted...but it is only a model

I wish the Apollo program continued.

Granted, but it continued using the old capsules over and over until all of them break apart at the exact same time somehow.

I wish that the lunar "seas" (the big dark spots on the moon where lava once flowed) were actually seas.
